trans-unit.source:
Hej %firstName%,

thank you for registering with Transport Talent. From now on, you will benefit from our network of selected specialists. We will also be happy to talk to you in person to discuss further steps. Simply select a suitable date under the following link: https://calendly.com/michel-rothgaenger.

In the meantime, if you have any questions about any of our services, simply reply to this e-mail. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

Best regards,
Michel Rothgaenger
Chief Operating Officer
Transport Talent

Transport Talent
trans-unit.target:
Hola %title% %lastname%,

Gracias por unirte a transporttalent.com.

Ya puedes beneficiarte de nuestra red de talentos y empleadores. Un asesor de nuestro equipo se pondrá en contacto contigo en los próximos días para el caso de que necesites nuestra ayuda con los primeros pasos en nuestro portal.

Si tuvieras alguna duda y necesitas que nos pongamos en contacto contigo a la mayor brevedad, contesta a este correo solicitándolo.

Saludos cordiales

Michel Rothgaenger
Director gerente
